entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
